title: Can i still use the border if i have the icon but don't want to use the icon ?
body: Does the icon has to be selected for border to appear? Because i have lovely flower icon, but i want only the border, so can i have the border if i have the icon but don't select it? And if not can you fix it so people can do it if they have the icon, but do not wish to use it? (I am talking about the vs event tingy)

replies.body: As long as you own the icon/ward skin, the border should show up regardless of whether you have it equipped or not!
Thanks so much for fast reply. And your answer made me really happy ^^ i am looking forward to my border :)
